name: amelentev Maven Repository
body:
You can add to your pom.xml by:
```xml
<project>
  ...
  <repositories>
    <repository>
      <id>amelentev</id>
      <url>http://amelentev.github.org/mvnrepo/</url>
    </repository>
  </repositories>
  ...
</project>
```
tagline: apache maven repository for my projects
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
